description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans diverse topics like digital fragmentation, decentralization, and innovation practices. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his interdisciplinary approach, exploring concepts from philosophy, technology, and social systems to address global challenges and reimagine future possibilities.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, philosopher, and tech innovator reimagining education and digital landscapes. Blends academic insight with entrepreneurial spirit to foster inclusive, decentralized systems and knowledge sharing.
